00027 extern "C" {
00028 #include <errno.h>

00030 #include <sys/stat.h>
00031 }
00032 
00033 #include "Logger.h"
00034 
00035 namespace Hypertable {
00036 
00037   class NumberStream {
00038     
00039   public:
00040     NumberStream(const char *fname) {
00041       struct stat statbuf;
00042       
00043       if (stat(fname, &statbuf) != 0) {
00044         HT_ERRORF("Problem stating file '%s' - %s", fname, strerror(errno));
00045         exit(1);
00046       }
00047       if (statbuf.st_size < (off_t)sizeof(int32_t)) {
00048         HT_ERRORF("Number stream file '%s' is not big enough, must be at least 4 bytes long", fname);
00049         exit(1);
00050       }
00051       
00052       if ((m_fp = fopen(fname, "r")) == 0) {
00053         HT_ERRORF("Unable to open number stream file '%s'", fname);
00054         exit(1);
00055       }
00056     }
00057     ~NumberStream() {
00058       fclose(m_fp);
00059     }
00060     uint32_t getInt() {
00061       uint32_t number;
00062 
00063       if (fread(&number, sizeof(int32_t), 1, m_fp) == 0) {
00064         fseek(m_fp, 0L, SEEK_SET);
00065         if (fread(&number, sizeof(int32_t), 1, m_fp) == 0) {
00066           HT_ERROR("Problem reading integer from number stream, exiting...");
00067           exit(1);
00068         }
00069       }
00070 
00071       return number;
00072     }
00073 
00074   private:
00075     FILE *m_fp;
00076   };
00077 
00078 }

00080 #endif // HYPERTABLE_NUMBERSTREAM_H
